::CyberShark::

    He flew into the cave after finding Battera's signal ag=
ain. He stopped and transformed to bot mode and decloaked in the shadows.
 =
   "Battera are you all right?" He said walking up to her, ignoring Vulois.=

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: logomorph@... 
  To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, October 13, 2000 12:43 PM
  Subject: In the =
cave


  ::Battera::

  She listened to Vulois. She thought about it.  she =
closed her eyes 
  and remembered when she had been the one to ask forgiven=
ess.  She let 
  go of the ceiling, stretched out her wings and floated to =
the floor. 
  She walked out of the cave and looked around. In the canyon, =
her 
  voice echoed,"Look...uh..if you want to talk?" she paused, thinking =

  if this was the right thing to do."I'll talk if you want."
  She stood t=
here, at the cave enterence, her wings folded around her 
  like a cape, wa=
iting for a responce.


  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:=

  > (Sorry LSK, but I was only using the Qwest Internet things as a one 
 =
 > time thing, because of the problems Yanshosh has had. And I'm sure 
  > =
that those bots in the BW have heard of an IBM Computer, because 
  all 
  =
> the autobots and decepticons were all fluent in human technology, 
  and =

  > I'm sure that that knowledge was past on through the upgrade. And 
  >=
 about your thing with Nemesis Inforcer, there's a problem. Because 
  > th=
e Matrix is telling you to stop peace, but the Matrix was telling 
  > me a=
nd is telling child to make peace. What's with that?)
  > 
  > Starscream
 =
 > 
  > "All right, thanks KitKat. Come on, Drillbit, let's find that 
  li=
ttle 
  > piece of explosive diareha waiting to happen.(Get it? Because fir=
e 
  > comes out of his ass! Now that's creativity!)"
  > 
  > Starscream f=
lys out of the base, scanning for Inferno.
  > 
  _________________________=
_____________________________________________
  > Vulois
  > 
  > Vulois lo=
oks up, thinking he knows where Battera is. He sighs.
  > 
  > "All right, =
I'll leave. It's just that this image I saw really 
  > disturbed me. And i=
f I have more, I'm going to go back to you. I'm 
  > sorry for the way I tr=
eated you. If we were friends before, I would 
  > like you to focus on tha=
t, and forgive me." Vulois flew out of the 
  > cave. Something inside him =
was burning up. Something was fighting. 
  He 
  > flew and found a tree br=
anch, wanting to think.
  > 
  ____________________________________________=
__________________________
  > Gotron
  > 
  > Gotron arrived where Zardus =
was, and asked him:
  > 
  > "So, what did you call me for? I was in the pr=
ocess of spying on 
  > KitKat!" This wasn't true, but he wanted to look go=
od infront of 
  > Zardus, his idle.
  > 
  _______________________________=
_______________________________________
  > Prebon
  > 
  > Prebon sat ther=
e, with the canister containing Lightrade in his 
  arms, 
  > and thought.=
 This was the first big loss he ever had. He was 
  dealing 
  > with the b=
ig guys now. He felt as disguraged as the time his father 
  > was incredib=
ly mad at him for attacking the Maximal complex with 
  > Lightrade.(Refere=
d to in the first chapter of Prebon's fanfic, 
  which 
  > I am in the pro=
cess of writing.) But he wasn't out yet. He still 
  had 
  > Slayer. And S=
pears' programming would be fighting till the bitter 
  > end. And that Koj=
 must be going nuts with the pain. Infact, this 
  > wasn't really a loss a=
t all. If anything the Maximals are weaker 
  and 
  > ready for a finished=
 off attack. Maybe he would attack again soon, 
  > but not to finish them =
off. He needed a device to destory those 
  anti-
  > chips they had in the=
ir brains, and that would take time. And in 
  that 
  > time they would re=
pair. But he will win this in the long run. What 
  he 
  > needed was an p=
artnership. A back-up. Some group who enjoyed 
  violence 
  > as much as h=
is did. He got up and immediatly went searching the 
  > database for his r=
easearch he made before he got here.
